home_section_left_text: With Mirroor you can detect your wellbeing daily by uploading audio explaining how you feel mentally and physically.
mic_not_detected: Apologies, we couldn't detect a microphone connected to your device. Please check your microphone settings and try again.

audio_processing_2: Results will be displayed below after processing.
process_audio: Process your audio with Mirroor AI
listen_again: Listen to review the recorded audio & start processing or discard audio.
no_transcription:
No transcription.
Make sure your audio contains a speech or audio that can be recognized.
issue_processing_audio:
Got some issue while processing your audio.

nothing_to_show_here:
Nothing to show here.

issue_processing_request: An error occured while processing your request.

name: Name
